column3: Scientific Knowledge [Obtain broad knowledge base within a discipline]
column4: Scientific Knowledge [Evaluate, interrogate, and integrate existing scientific evidence]
column5: Scientific Knowledge [Develop in-depth understanding of chosen research area(s)]
column6: Scientific Knowledge [Incorporate and apply interdisciplinary knowledge and approaches]
column7: Scientific Knowledge [Make connections between concepts and/or ideas]
column8: Scientific Knowledge [Develop an awareness of one’s cognitive processes (i.e. metacognition)]
column9: Study Design [Formulate a research question and/or a testable working model]
column10: Study Design [Develop and articulate a research project (project level)]
column11: Study Design [Design and propose individual experiments (experiment level)]
column12: Study Design [Create plans for managing data and sharing research outputs]
column13: Study Design [Recognize and seek expert support/consultation when needed]
column14: Experimental Skills [Conduct experiments using appropriate tools, techniques, and equipment]
column15: Experimental Skills [Identify and troubleshoot technical issues]
column16: Experimental Skills [Define relevant parameters and record/collect primary data]
column17: Experimental Skills [Adhere to safe laboratory practices and procedures]
column18: Data Analysis and Interpretation [Transform data into useful formats for rigorous analysis]
column19: Data Analysis and Interpretation [Use data and computational/statistical methods to answer scientific questions]
column20: Data Analysis and Interpretation [Create data visualizations]
column21: Data Analysis and Interpretation [Interpret and draw conclusions from computational, quantitative, and/or statistical analyses]
column22: Data Analysis and Interpretation [Utilize, adapt, or develop bioinformatics and computational tools and resources]
column23: Scientific Communication [Communicate science in distinct formats]
column24: Scientific Communication [Tailor communication to different audiences]
column25: Scientific Communication [Support and participate in the peer review process]
column26: Scientific Communication [Engage in scholarly scientific discussion]
column27: Responsible Conduct of Research [Understand and uphold relevant regulations, policies, procedures and practices]
column28: Responsible Conduct of Research [Recognize, avoid, and prevent questionable research practices (QRP) or research misconduct]
column29: Responsible Conduct of Research [Make responsible and ethical decisions based on established professional norms]
column30: Responsible Conduct of Research [Identify and utilize institutional support and resources related to responsible conduct of research]
column31: Teaching [Evaluate, tailor, and/or create educational material based on the needs of learners]
column32: Teaching [Understand and employ evidence-based teaching practices]
column33: Teaching [Assess the effectiveness of teaching practices]
column34: Mentoring [Build and maintain productive relationships with mentees]
column35: Mentoring [Promote professional growth of mentees based on their needs/interests]
column36: Management and Leadership [Plan and organize projects]
column37: Management and Leadership [Manage time and prioritize tasks]
column38: Management and Leadership [Lead, motivate, empower, and inspire others]
column39: Management and Leadership [Give and receive feedback]
column40: Management and Leadership [Navigate difficult conversations, negotiations, and conflict resolution]
column41: Career and Professional Development [Explore and assess career interests and opportunities]
column42: Career and Professional Development [Take active steps toward career advancements]
column43: Career and Professional Development [Build and maintain a professional/intellectual network]
column44: Career and Professional Development [Adhere to professional standards and practices]
column45: Career and Professional Development [Advocate for oneself and/or others]
column46: Resilience [Recognize and manage thoughts, emotions, and behaviors (i.e., self-awareness and self-regulation)]
column47: Resilience [Develop and practice growth mindset and positive thinking]
column50: Resilience [Build strong relationships and maintain a supportive network]
column51: Resilience [Be proactive in seeking help and support when needed]
column52: Researcher Identity  [Cultivate an identity as an independent scholar and researcher]
column53: Researcher Identity  [Explore and integrate research and other dimensions of one’s identities]
column54: Researcher Identity  [Practice scientific citizenship and promote meaningful interactions between science and society]
column55: Scientific Culture and Community [Understand and navigate institutional and cultural norms of the research community]
column56: Scientific Culture and Community [Collaborate and work with colleagues from different backgrounds]
column57: Scientific Culture and Community [Understand the impact of identity and intersectionality on each individual's experience]
column58: Scientific Culture and Community [Foster a culture of diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging]
